body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Pennsylvania native. Married to Nathan Falwell in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 27, 1816. Married to John Harrington in Jefferson County on June 2, 1825. Mother of Alonzo Harrington. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Resident of Louisville in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860.
